Uses of Class
courses.ComponentWeightage

  • Packages that use ComponentWeightage 
    Package Description
    consoleIO  
    courses  
    creation  
    grading  

    • Uses of ComponentWeightage in consoleIO

      Methods in consoleIO that return ComponentWeightage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ComponentWeightage ConsoleIOHandler.getComponentWeightageFromCourse(Course course)
      This method gets a Component name from the user and returns a Component (weightage), from a particular Course, which has the corresponding name.

    • Uses of ComponentWeightage in courses

      Subclasses of ComponentWeightage in courses 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AggregateComponentWeightage
      This entity class is a Component that holds subcomponents as an ArrayList of Component.
      Methods in courses that return types with arguments of type ComponentWeightage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<ComponentWeightage> Course.getAllComponentsWeightage()
      Getter for componentWeightageList.
      java.util.ArrayList<ComponentWeightage> AggregateComponentWeightage.getSubcomponentWeightageList()
      Getter for subcomponents.
      Methods in courses with parameters of type ComponentWeightage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Course.addComponentWeightage(ComponentWeightage newComponent)
      This method adds a new ComponentWeightage passed in as argument to componentWeightageList.
      void AggregateComponentWeightage.addSubcomponentWeightage(ComponentWeightage subcomponent)
      Setter for subcomponents.
      Constructors in courses with parameters of type ComponentWeightage 
      Constructor and Description
      ComponentWeightage(ComponentWeightage another)
      This constuctor initialises the name and weightage of this Component based on the name and weightage of another Component passed in as argument.
      Constructor parameters in courses with type arguments of type ComponentWeightage 
      Constructor and Description
      AggregateComponentWeightage(java.lang.String componentName, int componentWeightage, java.util.ArrayList<ComponentWeightage> subcomponents)
      This constructor initialises the Aggregate Component based on the name, weightage and subcomponents (as an ArrayList of Component) passed in as arguments.

    • Uses of ComponentWeightage in creation

      Methods in creation that return ComponentWeightage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ComponentWeightage CreationInterface.setComponentMetadata(int componentIndex, int componentsTotalWeightage)
      This method sets a Component's metadata based on user input when the user is creating course's component.
      static ComponentWeightage CreationInterface.setSubcomponentMetadata(AggregateComponentWeightage rootComponent, int indexWithinRoot, int subcomponentsTotalWeightage)
      This method sets a Subcomponent's metadata based on user input when the user is creating Component's subcomponent.

    • Uses of ComponentWeightage in grading

      Constructor for component result (without marks)

      Constructor for Component Result
      Constructor parameters in grading with type arguments of type ComponentWeightage 
      Constructor and Description
      OverallResult(java.util.ArrayList<ComponentWeightage> componentWeightageList)
      This constructor takes in componentWeightageList as template for initialisation of its componentResultList.
